network
Class BuildHuffmanTree

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--network.BuildHuffmanTree
class BuildHuffmanTree
extends java.lang.Object

This class is not used in runtime of Umelange, It creates to build the static huffmann tree, out of the priority values. These values have been guessed, until the compression array was identical to the hardcoded structures of UOX.

walkTree

static void walkTree(Node node,
                     int[] vals,
                     int[] lens,
                     int curval,
                     int curlen)
Walks down the tree storing values ans lens into the arrays Made for debugging and controlling purposes, resynthesized tree has to be exactly like original. Also counts the nodes of the tree and stores it in global variable treesize
Parameters:
node - the root node
vaks - array where the compression values will be stored.
lens - array where the length of the compresssion values will be stored
curval - current value represented by this node. (calculated of its position in the tree)

                                       int level,
